Terrible waiter. Rude to everyone in the restaurant. Embarrassing to sit there. Never again that place as long as that person works there. Poor service as well.
This is the place to go if you want a relaxed place to hang out with friends. A genuine place with the best grilled hamburgers in town.

Welcome to the eighties!
Here you will get filet Oscar and plankstek.
But it's pretty well done, the service is efficient and it's good value for money.
A fun place for an informal dinner or just drinks.
